title: Help !!! Hexchests
body: So, as far as I know, you get a chest when you or one of your teammates get a S. I haven't receive any chests for about four or five games when either me or my teammates got S. Please help because I really need the chests.

replies.body: *ZombieMaster* provided a great bundle of information here. If you have any examples of matches where you believe you should have gotten chest, please link me the [Match History](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/) page for it.

First, you won't get a chest if just any teammate gets an S. You have to be in a premade party with that teammate in order to get a chest.

Also, you can only earn one chest per champion per season. Once you earn a chest on a champion, you will be unable to earn another chest while playing as that champion until next season. If you want more chests, you will need to play different champions.

If you have anymore questions, feel free to ask.
